verses.name: Romans 12:3
verses.text: For I say, through the grace given unto me, to every man that is among you, not to think of himself more highly than he ought to think; but to think soberly, according as God hath dealt to every man the measure of faith.

verses.name: Romans 12:4
verses.text: For as we have many members in one body, and all members have not the same office:

verses.name: Romans 12:5
verses.text: So we, being many, are one body in Christ, and every one members one of another.
